content: Hello everyone, I'm Christian, I've been doing some small work for the compiler here and there for the last 3 years. Currently, I'm working on miri under @RalfJ and @oli guidance. I'm interested in type systems and compilers in general.
@Christian Poveda you may also find that introducing yourself on #new members better, given that you seem to be a bit more experienced
I meant, anywhere would be fine, but here there's probably less people subscribed given that's a new stream yet
